references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners
references.reason: This paper introduces Masked Autoencoders (MAE), a foundational model that inspired the development of PCP-MAE for point cloud processing.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders for point cloud self-supervised learning
references.reason: Point-MAE is directly extended by PCP-MAE, serving as a crucial baseline for comparison and improvement.

references.paper_title: PointNet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: PointNet is a fundamental work in point cloud deep learning, providing the basis for many subsequent methods, including PCP-MAE's patch embedding strategy.

references.paper_title: PointNet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: PointNet++ extends PointNet with hierarchical structures, improving upon its performance and directly influencing PCP-MAE's architecture.

references.paper_title: 3d shapenets: A deep representation for volumetric shapes
references.reason: ShapeNet, introduced in this paper, is the dataset used in PCP-MAE for pre-training, demonstrating its significance for 3D deep learning advancements.
